title: html_formatter.rb:141:in `extra_failure_content': undefined method `map' for nil:NilClass (NoMethodError)
body:
RSpec crashes here and in the Output it says 'Couldn't get snippet for'. Any ideas how to fix this?

Ruby 2.2.2
Rspec 3.3.1

Full Stacktrace:
